description: Provide comprehensive and authoritative medical information by querying multiple trusted sources including FDA, WHO, PubMed, RxNorm, and Google Scholar. Enable detailed drug data retrieval, health statistics access, and medical literature search to support healthcare and research needs. Facilitate seamless integration with MCP-compatible clients for reliable medical data and research insights.

defaultCountryIso3.description: Default country ISO3 code for WHO queries (optional)

tools.name: search-drugs
tools.title: Search Drugs
tools.description: Search for drug information using FDA database

query.description: Drug name to search for (brand name or generic name)

tools.name: pbs-get-latest-schedule
tools.title: Get Latest PBS Schedule
tools.description: Resolve the current latest PBS schedule_code for reuse by other calls.

tools.name: pbs-list-schedules
tools.title: List PBS Schedules
tools.description: List PBS schedules (optionally only the latest schedule)

latest_only.description: If true, only returns the latest schedule_code

tools.name: pbs-list-dispensing-rules
tools.title: List PBS Dispensing Rules
tools.description: List PBS dispensing rules optionally filtered by mnemonic/title/reference.

dispensing_rule_mnem.description: Filter by dispensing rule mnemonic, e.g. 's90-cp'.

dispensing_rule_title.description: Filter by human-readable dispensing rule title.

dispensing_rule_reference.description: Filter by dispensing rule reference id.

community_pharmacy_indicator.description: Filter by community pharmacy applicability (TRUE for community pharmacy).

tools.name: pbs-get-restrictions-for-item
tools.title: Get PBS Item Restrictions
tools.description: Fetch restriction text (legal instrument + notes/cautions) for a PBS item code; auto-uses the item's schedule if not provided.

limit.description: How many restriction groups to show.

schedule_code.description: Optional schedule code; if omitted, uses the item's schedule.

tools.name: pbs-get-prescribers-for-item
tools.title: Get PBS Item Prescribers
tools.description: List prescriber types allowed for a PBS item across schedules (e.g., Medical Practitioners).

tools.name: pbs-get-atc-for-item
tools.title: Get PBS Item ATC Classification
tools.description: Return ATC classification(s) for a PBS item, enriched with ATC descriptions (de-duplicated).

tools.name: pbs-get-amt-mapping
tools.title: Get PBS Item AMT Mapping
tools.description: Return AMT concept mapping (MP/MPUU/MPP/TPP) for a PBS item (de-duplicated).

tools.name: pbs-get-organisation-for-item
tools.title: Get PBS Item Organisation
tools.description: Return manufacturer/responsible person info for a PBS item (from /organisations).

tools.name: pbs-get-copayments
tools.title: Get PBS Copayments
tools.description: Return PBS copayment amounts and Safety Net thresholds (latest by default).

schedule_code.description: Optional schedule code; if omitted, resolves latest.

tools.name: pbs-get-price-events-for-item
tools.title: Get PBS Item Price Events
tools.description: Return statutory price reduction events for a PBS item (de-duplicated).

tools.name: pbs-get-program-details
tools.title: Get PBS Item Program Details
tools.description: Return program info and dispensing rules for a PBS item (de-duplicated rules).

tools.name: pbs-get-item
tools.title: Get PBS Item
tools.description: Fetch PBS item(s) by pbs_item_code and optional schedule_code; returns compact summary lines.

tools.name: pbs-search-item-overview
tools.title: Search PBS Item Overview
tools.description: Search PBS item-overview using simple ODATA-like filters (brand_name/li_drug_name/pbs_code, etc.).

filter.description: Equality filters only (e.g., brand_name eq 'PANADOL', li_drug_name eq 'PARACETAMOL', or raw brand_name).

tools.name: pbs-search
tools.title: Search PBS API
tools.description: Query Australia's PBS public API (rate-limited; ~20s between calls).

params.description: Query parameters passed through (validated per endpoint).

tools.name: pbs-summary-of-changes
tools.title: PBS Summary of Changes
tools.description: Summarize changes between schedules for a given endpoint/table (INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE).

schedule_code.description: Target schedule code; if omitted uses latest.

tools.name: list-who-indicators
tools.title: List WHO Indicators
tools.description: List WHO indicators by searching for a keyword (useful to find exact indicator names/codes)

query.description: Keyword to search in WHO Indicator names

tools.name: pbs-get-fees-for-item
tools.title: Get PBS Item Fees
tools.description: Fetch PBS fees by resolving an item's program_code, optionally for a specific schedule

tools.name: get-drug-details
tools.title: Get Drug Details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific drug by NDC (National Drug Code)

ndc.description: National Drug Code (NDC) of the drug

tools.name: get-health-statistics
tools.title: Get Health Statistics
tools.description: Get health statistics and indicators from WHO Global Health Observatory

indicator.description: Health indicator to search for (e.g., 'Life expectancy', 'Mortality rate')

tools.name: search-medical-literature
tools.title: Search Medical Literature
tools.description: Search for medical research articles in PubMed

query.description: Medical topic or condition to search for

max_results.description: Maximum number of articles to return (max 20)

tools.name: search-drug-nomenclature
tools.title: Search Drug Nomenclature
tools.description: Search for drug information using RxNorm (standardized drug nomenclature)

query.description: Drug name to search for in RxNorm database

tools.name: search-google-scholar
tools.title: Search Google Scholar
tools.description: Search for academic research articles using Google Scholar

query.description: Academic topic or research query to search for
